author: robbie
msg: QPID-2051: Update startup scripts to disable the Log4J default initialisation process. Add QpidLog4JConfigurator that validates the XML file before allowing it to be applied. Alter startup behaviour to shut the broker down if the specified log4j XML file is present present but invalid. Uses the -Damqj.logging.level(defaults to info) with the log4j.properties file in the broker jar if the XML file is not found.

author: rpluem
msg: * Do better checking of pollset operations in various places to avoid segfaults.
